reviews.text:
Had a lovely night here even though half of the hotel was under renovation. Couldn't hear any additional noise due that.

Very friendly staff, rooms were clean and renewed. Breakfast buffet was better than average which included omelette for your liking.

Restaurant staff also quick and helpful.

Location is just perfect!

This hotel is undoubtedly beautiful and luxurious and the location at the Esplanade is convenient and scenic.
The breakfast caters to Western tastes only, but the view in the restaurant makes up for it. Coffee, tea and service are great.
Even with the best efforts, the rooms retain a smell from aged materials, as one would expect from a historic hotel. But something to be aware of for those with sensitive noses.
The showers are quite small but the rest of the bathrooms is spacious.
Very elegant hotel. The staff is very friendly and helpful. If I am ever visiting Helsinki again in the future, this will be the place I'll stay. Very centrally located.

Excellent location, solid & comfortable bed, big bathroom, friendly & helpful staffs.

Room is a bit small, breakfast: selection is limited (wish have steam vegetables, chicken sausage, better coffee). Sauna area is not big.

Staying at Hotel Kämp was like entering a dream world, but with more luxury and less snooze. From the grand lobby to my spacious room, everything screamed VIP. The bed? So comfy I considered taking it home. The bathroom was bigger than my first apartment!
Breakfast was a royal feast—I lost count of my trips to the buffet. The coffee alone is worth a stay. I even tried the sauna and came out feeling like a new person—relaxed and refreshed.

Hotel Kämp made me feel like royalty. If you want to be pampered and indulge in luxury, this is your spot. Just don’t blame me if you never want to leave!
